Returns `nil` otherwise. It is possible for an instance of `NSAppleScript` that has been instantiated with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAppleScript/init(contentsOf:error:)] to be a script for which the source code is not available, but is nonetheless executable.

# richTextSource

**Instance Property**

Returns the syntax-highlighted source code of the receiver if the receiver has been compiled and its source code is available.

## Declaration

```swift
var richTextSource: NSAttributedString? { get }
```

## Discussion

Returns `nil` otherwise. It is possible for an instance of `NSAppleScript` that has been instantiated with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAppleScript/init(contentsOf:error:)] to be a script for which the source code is not available, but is nonetheless executable.
title: richTextSource
